hadiths.text: Abdullah bin Unais said that he and Umar bin Khattab were speaking about Sadaqah one day, and:Umar bin Khattab said: “Did you not hear the Messenger of Allah when he mentioned Ghulul with the Sadaqah (and said): 'Whoever steals a camel or a sheep from it, he will be brought carrying it on the Day of Resurrection?' ” Abdullah bin Unais said: “Yes.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي عُمَّالِ الصَّدَقَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning the collectors of Zakat
